title: Ethical Scanner
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
product_info_not_found_for_barcode: Product information not found for barcode: {barcode}.

product_info.ingredients_image_added: Vegan/Vegetarian Information Unavailable: Sorry, we are working on it
product_info.country_where_sold_colon: Country where the product is sold:
product_info.initial_book_code_description: The initial {eanPrefix} in this barcode is the Book-land EAN prefix, indicating that it is a book. The {eanPrefix} prefix, in this case, is assigned to the English language, but it doesn't specify a particular country.

scan.limited_on_web: âš ️ Limited functionality on Web. Product details may be incomplete due to technical restrictions.
scan.unable_on_web: Unable to read barcode on web. This may be a known issue. Try adjusting the barcode position or use a different device.
scan.no_valid_barcode_detected: No valid barcode detected. Please try again.
scan.no_camera_found: No camera found or failed to open camera!

photo.capture_ingredients: Make a photo of the ingredients.

privacy_policy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This page outlines our privacy policy.
privacy_policy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application, whether on mobile, web, or desktop platforms.

information_we_collect.title: Information We Collect
information_we_collect.content: We do not collect any personal information. We do not use cookies or similar tracking technologies.

permissions.title: Permissions and Device Access
permissions.content: The app uses the device's camera solely for barcode scanning. No images or personal content are captured, stored, or transmitted. The app also requires internet access to retrieve product data from external databases. No personal information is transmitted during this process.

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Any data processed by the app is related to usage interactions and is not shared with third parties.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You are advised to review this page periodically for any changes.

contact.title: How can you contact us?
contact.content_part1: If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at
contact.content_part2: . We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.
